fields.name: u89lfclfhc
fields.label: Allow Continuous Material Consumption
fields.description: Allow material consumptions without immediately manufacturing finished goods against a Work Order

fields.name: u897j6pf4o
fields.label: Get Raw Materials Cost from Consumption Entry

fields.name: u89e2c0j4f
fields.label: Validate Components and Quantities Per BOM

fields.name: u89gakcurj
fields.label: Update BOM Cost Automatically
fields.description: Update BOM cost automatically via scheduler, based on the latest Valuation Rate/Price List Rate/Last Purchase Rate of raw materials

fields.name: u897s3dauh
fields.label: Overproduction for Sales and Work Order

fields.name: u890er3ahs
fields.label: Transfer Extra Raw Materials to WIP (%)
fields.description: The user will be able to transfer additional materials from the store to the Work in Progress (WIP) warehouse.

fields.name: u89u02kd12
fields.label: Add Corrective Operation Cost in Finished Good Valuation

fields.name: u89qit59ur
fields.label: Enforce Time Logs
fields.description: Enabling this checkbox will force each Job Card Time Log to have From Time and To Time

fields.name: u89u0e16sh
fields.label: Allow Excess Material Transfer
fields.description: Allow transferring raw materials even after the Required Quantity is fulfilled

fields.name: u89ftagkvk
fields.label: Allow Overtime
fields.description: Plan time logs outside Workstation working hours

fields.name: u897ghaoe6
fields.label: Capacity Planning For (Days)
fields.description: Plan operations X days in advance

fields.name: u8988pr5st
fields.label: Set Operating Cost / Scrap Items From Sub-assemblies
fields.description: To include sub-assembly costs and scrap items in Finished Goods on a work order without using a job card, when the 'Use Multi-Level BOM' option is enabled.

fields.name: u89squ96t1
fields.label: Make Serial No / Batch from Work Order
fields.description: System will automatically create the serial numbers / batch for the Finished Good on submission of work order
